description: Try our easy to follow Curried Sausages with Yellow Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Curried Sausages with Yellow Fried Rice
name: Curried Sausages with Yellow Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450 g microwave white long grain rice

recipeInstructions.text: Serve curried sausages with yellow fried rice. Tip 1: Freeze for up to 2 months, thaw in refrigerator overnight. Tip 2: Swap the cream with evaporated milk. Tip 3: Swap the spinach with 125g can corn kernels, drained and rinsed.
